img_summary: The image depicts a scene from a video game where two characters are engaged in combat in a lush, forested environment. On the left, a large, armored creature with a horned helmet and wielding a long weapon is attacking. On the right, a smaller character, possibly a player-controlled character, is defending with a glowing red sword. The interface shows various icons and health bars, including a name "Yellow Loong," suggesting a boss fight. The setting is detailed with green foliage and rocky terrain.
